infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan barcodes on event tickets.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses the location to create a list of local services.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app uses the calendar to set events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app uses the reminders to create a list of local services
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app reads health data to update your profile.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app saves data from the app to healthkit profile.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to review rich media previously added.
infoPlist.NSFallDetectionUsageDescription: This app uses fall detection to alert authorities.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses bluetooth to connect to bluetooth devices.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to create a list of local services.
infoPlist.NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD: This app uses clinical health records to share with your doctor.
